subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Ben Askelson homered to lead off the bottom of the seventh and send Billings, Mont., past Huntington Beach, Calif., 1-0, in the Little League World Series in South Williamsport, Pa.
snippet: Ben Askelson homered to lead off the bottom of the seventh and send Billings, Mont., past Huntington Beach, Calif., 1-0, in the Little League World Series in South Williamsport, Pa.
